trans-unit.source: The base exception class for the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 基底例外狀況類別<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況的原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException"></xref>使用序列化資料的類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 重新建構所需的資料流上傳輸的例外狀況物件的還原序列化期間呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 保存序列化的物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.SqlTypes.SqlTypeException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端，才能確保這個字串已經被當地語系化為目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the `innerException` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`innerException`參數不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引發目前的例外狀況<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>處理內部例外狀況區塊。
